Details: Both agents provide comprehensive cost and effort estimates for PostgreSQL to PySpark migration. Cost_Estimation_Agent delivers concise structured analysis ($9 runtime, 38 hours effort), while Migration_Analysis_Agent provides detailed markdown documentation ($8.10 runtime, 32-44 hours effort). Both reach similar conclusions with different presentation styles.

Line_References: Lines 1-15 vs 1-25 (cost section), Lines 16-35 vs 26-80 (effort section)
Details: High semantic alignment on core objectives and calculations. Both estimate similar runtime costs ($8-9), data processing volumes (~430-435 GB), and total effort (32-44 hours). Migration_Analysis_Agent provides more granular breakdown and reasoning, while Cost_Estimation_Agent is more direct. Minor differences in DBU assumptions (10 vs 12) and effort ranges.

Similar logical flow: Cost estimation → Effort analysis → API cost → Summary. Cost_Estimation_Agent uses numbered sections (1.1, 2.1, etc.), Migration_Analysis_Agent uses markdown headers. Both include similar subsections but Migration_Analysis_Agent has additional summary table and notes sections. Different formatting approaches but consistent information architecture.
Syntactically correct structured text format. Clear numbering system, proper calculations, consistent formatting. Minor issue: some bullet points could be better aligned (lines 8-12).

Excellent markdown syntax throughout. Proper headers, tables, bullet points, and formatting. All calculations are clearly presented and documented. Very minor: could use consistent spacing in table (line 95).

Consider adding more detailed breakdown of effort estimation methodology and include summary table for better readability. The concise format is valuable but could benefit from additional context.
Excellent comprehensive analysis. Consider standardizing DBU assumptions with other estimates and ensure consistency in effort range presentation (32-44 hours vs specific values).

Both outputs provide valuable perspectives - Cost_Estimation_Agent offers quick reference format while Migration_Analysis_Agent provides detailed documentation. Consider combining approaches for optimal stakeholder communication.
